cells.data:
-- Adequate for small sorts, but sort :: Ord a => [a] -> [a], (which uses the ObjC
-- sortedArrayUsingSelector) is the one to use

-- quickSort :: (Ord a) => [a] -> [a]on quickSort(xs)	if length of xs > 1 then		set h to item 1 of xs		script			on |λ|(x)				x ≤ h			end |λ|		end script		set {less, more} to partition(result, rest of xs)		quickSort(less) & h & quickSort(more)	else		xs	end ifend quickSort
